text: بِنَصۡرِ ٱللَّهِۚ يَنصُرُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

translation.en: In the victory of Allah. He gives victory to whom He wills, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful
translation.id: karena pertolongan Allah. Dia menolong siapa yang Dia kehendaki. Dia Mahaperkasa, Maha Penyayang
